Hey there, my name is Adam Leith, I'm a Front End Developer and User Experience Designer based out of Montreal, Canada.

Creating relationships with people worth keeping. I'm currently available for contract work. Contact me.



A Front End Developer implies two things: The perfectionist eye of a Designer, and the problem solving mentality of Developer. Keeping my work beautiful, useable, and highly efficient excites me.

Change: At times, things get crazy: design changes and priorities change- chaos ensues, correct? No. Label me cautious, but building websites while predicting change, are absolutely fundamental to my work. Creating modular code keeps me on my toes and I love it.

+ —

  • Branding

FxAllaire

I was tasked to design an Apple-esque website for a online furniture company here in Montreal. With two proprietary office desks as my main subject matter, I had some fun.

Here are the final sketches of the landing pages. Front end mock up is in progress.

Role(s): Creative Director, Designer, User Experience

EveryDayHappy

A marketplace for your typical mom. Get all your baby products in one place, easily and efficiently.

Role(s): Lead Front End Developer, User Experience, Designer of style-guide creation and management.

Notes: I'm also Front End Lead of the signup process on the site. It can be found here.

Visit

BigRebel

A media platform serving up Games, Movies, Books and Music all in one place. With the signup process boasting over 1 million views per day, It is easily my most public work.

Role(s): Lead Front End Developer, User Experience, Designer of style-guide creation and management.

Notes: Translated into 12 different languages, keeping content flexible and "white-spaced" is a great task.

Visit

Hollandia

A beautiful flower and decoration shop in the small town of Hudson, Québec.

Role(s): Website design, Lead Web Developer.

Visit

Qwax

Qwax wax, proudly founded in Quebec, Canada.

Role(s): Brand creation

Link Energy

Link Energy is a North American Energy Retailer committed to helping homeowners, businesses and non-profit organizations procure their energy and manage their costs while giving back to their communities.

Role(s): Brand creation
